title: Gibdo
location: Can be found in the Hyrule Desert.

title: ReDead
description: Creepy shambling creatures that will try to hurt you.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.

title: Skulltula
description: Disturbing spiders that will crawl out of their homes just to mess up your day. Defintely aren't flying. They're on webs, duh.
location: Can be found all around Hyrule.
